title: 7-year-old girl injured in drive-by shooting
content:
HELENA-WEST HELENA (KATV) —
Helena-West Helena police are investigating a drive-by shooting where a 7-year-old girl and man were injured.
Police say the shooting happened on the 500 block of Kentucky Street just after 6 p.m. on December 25.
Both victims were taken to the hospital and their injuries are not life-threatening.
A witness told police they saw a white Jaguar vehicle leaving the scene.
If you have any information on this crime, call Helena-West Helena Police at 870-572-3441.
